verbs.description: [V: sliding] [ARG1: stones] in stanley stanley idaho is already known for its fishing its view of the sawtooth mountains and its frigid temperatures but it is also known as the one of the few places in america to be home to an outdoor curling competition phil shryock the house scotland joe rockenbach the bambi killers stanley idaho stanley boise curling club seattle
